name: Aldric Goldweaver
description: A nervous merchant who has been acting strangely since returning from the northern routes

start.speaker: npc
start.text: Ah, welcome to my humble shop! Please, browse at your leisure...

choices.text: I'd like to see what you have for sale
You seem troubled. Is everything alright?
I heard you recently returned from the northern routes. How was your journey?

shop_menu.speaker: npc
shop_menu.text: Of course! I have fine wares from across the land. Though... some items are not for sale just yet.

choices.text: What kind of items are you keeping back?
I'll take a look at what's available

troubled_response.speaker: npc
troubled_response.text: Troubled? No, no... just the usual concerns of a merchant. Bandits on the roads, you know. Nothing more than that.

choices.text: Your hands are shaking. This seems like more than bandit concerns.
I understand. The roads can be dangerous.
If you need any help dealing with trouble, I might be able to assist.

travel_story.speaker: npc
travel_story.text: The journey was... eventful. I made excellent time, actually. Strange weather helped push me along faster than usual.

choices.text: Faster than usual? But I heard the northern routes have been particularly difficult this season.
Did you acquire anything interesting on your travels?

mysterious_goods.speaker: npc
mysterious_goods.text: Ah, well... some items require special handling. Delicate fabrics, you understand. They need proper... preparation before display.

choices.text: These fabrics look unusual. Northern wool with southern dyes?
I can wait if you'd like to prepare them properly.

caught_contradiction.speaker: npc
caught_contradiction.text: I... well, you see... the weather was unusual this year! Very unusual indeed!

choices.text: Aldric, I think you need to tell me what really happened on those routes.

quest_hint.speaker: npc
quest_hint.text: You... you seem trustworthy. Perhaps... if you truly mean to help... there are strange things happening. Things that make an honest merchant question what's right and wrong.

choices.text: I'd like to help. Tell me what's been troubling you.
I'm sorry, but I can't get involved in complicated matters.

quest_start.speaker: npc
quest_start.text: Thank you! I... I've been carrying goods I shouldn't be carrying. Items that were given to me by hooded figures who promised great profits. But these items... they feel wrong. Evil, even.

choices.text: Tell me more about these hooded figures.
Can I examine these suspicious items?

end_conversation.speaker: npc
end_conversation.text: Safe travels, friend. May your path be free of the troubles that plague mine.
